thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Emily A. Saaen
thread.title_full: Airtasker reviewed by Emily A. Saaen

author: Emily A. Saaen
title: Emily A. Saaen
text:
So far, as I see, most posters just post a new job for everyone to see - even if they have prior agreement with a specific worker. It is detrimental to other workers, who lose time applying for jobs they won't get.
If there is an option to create a custom task, that is visible to only one specific person - most people have no idea where to find it. I suspect, it might be a "request Quote: " button, however, I still have no idea how it works.
Can I add people to favourites/contacts or some such? Nope, doesn't look like it.
Either the functionality need to be expanded, or the interface simplified.
